body_html:
After removing the NVIDIA drivers with apt remove --purge nvidia*` and rebooting, I only got a blank screen upon restart.

Luckily I was still able to log in via a terminal and install the latest stable NVIDIA drivers.

But probably there is a better way then just throwing all your drivers away.

body:
After removing the NVIDIA drivers with apt remove --purge nvidia*`  and rebooting, I only got a blank screen upon restart. 

Luckily I was still able to log in via a terminal and [install the latest stable NVIDIA drivers](http://askubuntu.com/questions/744419/blank-screen-after-nvidia-install).

But probably there is a better way then just throwing all your drivers away.
